title: Google\Cloud\CertificateManager\V1\DnsAuthorization
name: DnsAuthorization
description:
A DnsAuthorization resource describes a way to perform domain authorization for certificate issuance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.certificatemanager.v1.DnsAuthorization

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A user-defined name of the dns authorization. DnsAuthorization names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/dnsAuthorizations/*.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The creation timestamp of a DnsAuthorization.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last update timestamp of a DnsAuthorization.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Set of labels associated with a DnsAuthorization.

params.name: data.description
params.description: One or more paragraphs of text description of a DnsAuthorization.

params.name: data.domain
params.description: Required. Immutable. A domain which is being authorized. A DnsAuthorization resource covers a single domain and its wildcard, e.g. authorization for example.com can be used to issue certificates for example.com and *.example.com.

params.name: data.dns_resource_record
params.description: Output only. DNS Resource Record that needs to be added to DNS configuration.
